songs.lyrics:
[Verse: K Quick, Ron Gilmore, & Ari Lennox]
Yeah
Yeah, Yeah
Yeah
Yeah, Yeah
Oh, Oh
You feel the vibe?
You feel the vibe?
For miles and miles and miles
Miles and miles
Can you feel the vibe?
Do you feel the vibe?
For miles and miles and miles
Miles and miles
Oh, Oh, Oh
Do you feel the vibe?
Do you feel the vibe?
For miles and miles and miles
Miles and miles
Or am I too high?
Am I too high?
For miles and miles and miles
Miles and miles
Am I too high?
Cause I feel the vibe from miles and miles and miles
Miles and miles
Do you feel the vibe?
You feel the vibe?
songs.title: Miles and Miles
